system_manifest.primary_objective: Autonomous Enterprise Operations via Digital Chief of Staff

semantic_catalog.description: Ontology mapping 7 entities + insurance logic for AI context injection.

immutable_lineage_log.description: Append-only BigQuery table for tamper-proof logging and insurance audit trails.

identity_engine.description: Universal CRM tracking across Sales, Service, Fleet, and Logistics.

intelligent_inbox.description: Gemini-powered classification, renaming, and Drive routing pipeline.

agentic_router.description: Gemini 1.5 Pro intent classifier routing human commands to FINANCE, INVENTORY, SERVICE, CRM, LOGISTICS, or COMPLIANCE domains.

jit_websocket.description: WebSocket endpoint (/ws/chat) pushing MOUNT_PLATE commands to React UI for real-time JIT Plate hydration.

sovereign_memory_vector_db.description: Gemini text-embedding-004 powered Vector Vault for CEO strategic context, isolated from operational BigQuery data.

omnichannel_twilio.description: Twilio SMS webhook chaining Identity Resolution, Sovereign Memory, Agentic Router, KAMM Compliance Fence, and JIT Plate push into a single inbound SMS handler.

anomaly_monitor.description: Autonomous 3-check background auditor (Golden Rule, Entity Drift, Margin Alert) with Twilio CEO alerting and MSO Purity enforcement.

customer_jit_quotes.description: Public-facing Digital Quote portal with severity-coded health cards, KAMM Iowa Disclosure compliance, SMS verification gate, and Veblen Stealth Luxury UI.

KAMM_LLC.activity_limit: STRICT: Iowa Dealer Law Compliance, Title Processing, Damage Disclosures only.

personnel_access_matrix.AHSIN_CEO: Global Admin / Sovereign Access / Management Override

active_constraints: JIT UI: UI is stateless; Plates are mounted based on C-OS intent.
KAMM Scope: KAMM is purely a legal/compliance vehicle for dealership paperwork.
MSO Model: Carbon LLC carries zero operational risk.
Insurance Purity: No risk mixing; policy follows the entity action.

state_health.last_verified_action: Sync: Unified insurance model with Auto-Owners verified.
